Al Quran (Tafsir y analisis palabra por palabra) es una herramienta para estudio del Corán. Esta App ofrece: Reproducción de audio individual de versículos con opción de repetición, el Tafsir de Ibn Kazir (inglés), Taywid con ayuda de colores, analisis y traducción palabra por palabra, marcapáginas personalizado, busqueda, varias traducciones, plantillas personalizables y mucho más.
Encuentrela en Google Play Store: https://gtaf.org/apps/quran \n\n#GreentechApps

Rasulullah (SAWS) dijo: ''Quien no agradece a la gente, no habrá agradecido a Al-lah''
[Abu Dawud 4811]

Tomese unos minutos para calificar e inspirarnos para hacer más buenas acciones!
TU EVALUACIÓN ES MUY IMPORTANTE PARA NOSOTROS

Alhamdulillah. Al Quran (Tafsir y palabra por palabra) is a Quran Study Tool that allows you to enjoy: 
 
 • English Tafsir Ibn Kathir with embedded Arabic 
 • Color Coded Tajweed similar to iQuran (For Kitkat and up) 
 • Word by Word Translation Rendering, Grammatical, Root and Verb Form Details 
 • Bookmarks/Favourites separated into user made categories 
 • Quran Index 
 • Ability to take notes 
 • Bookmarks/Notes Import/export to online, file feature 
 • A powerful full-text search engine with highlights 
 • Robust audio system with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in memorization 
 • Various fonts, pinch-zoom feature and multiple Themes 
 • Autoscroll feature 
 • Different Quran Translations viewable simultaneously: Bengali, Chinese, English, French, Hindi, German, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Urdu and more 
 • Several downloadable recitations for verse by verse recital (supports gapless/continuous recitation) including Mishary Al-Afasy, Husari (muallim)


Courtesy: 
 • Grafian.com for their initial codes. 
 • Quran.com for their database server and Audio Mechanism. 
 • Quran Tafsir Pro App for their tafsir ibn Kathir and Corpus. 
 • Guidedverses.com for Khan & Hilali Commentary. 
 • Quranindex.info for their Quran index database. 
 • Academy of Quran Studies/Understand Quran for their verb forms database. 
 • Various other brothers & sisters helping with the project. May Allah bless them all
